Weapon.Name: Whisperwind Dagger
Weapon.Description: A blade as light as air, forged from the essence of a gentle breeze, yet capable of slicing through the toughest armor.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Grants the user the ability to perform a swift, nearly invisible strike.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As you move, the air itself seems to part, delivering a silent but deadly blow to your foe.

Weapon.Name: Starfire Staff
Weapon.Description: Emblazoned with runes that pulse with a light from another world, this staff channels the raw energy of the cosmos.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Unleashes a blast of cosmic energy, stunning enemies.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The heavens themselves seem to bend to your will, engulfing your enemies in a blinding radiance.

Weapon.Name: Galeforce Axe
Weapon.Description: A heavy weapon that roars with the fury of a thousand storms with each swing.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Creates a tempest that throws enemies off balance.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: With a mighty roar, the storm obeys your command, scattering your foes like leaves in the wind.
